title: Prime Deli Corporation Recalls Salads Containing Meat Products due to Possible Salmonella and Listeria monocytogenes Contamination in Corn
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 16, 2018 Prime Deli Corporation, a Lewisville, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 217 pounds of ready-to-eat salad with bacon products that contain a corn ingredient that may be contaminated with Salmonella and Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection...
